name: Firebreaks
description:
A fire has broken out. You must start making firebreaks to stop it.

Keep in mind that your priority is to save the marked targets. And that the fire outbreaks can appear anywhere, and will spread to the surrounding squares. Therefore, use your best strategy to defend the area you are most interested in.


--

Game for participation in MJAM22

-External resources:

https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic
